title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window vertically in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively. This behavior is not desirable.
OB: When resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: When resizing the window vertically, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window vertically only. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and Frames flash excessively.
